Package mru.a1.application

Class App

java.lang.Object
mru.a1.application.App
public class App extends Object
The class contains methods to read from a file, calculate scores based on applicant data, and write the results to an output file. It calculates various aspects such as age, language skills, education, work experience, and adaptability, to determine if applicants are qualified.

    • secondaryLanguageSkillsCalculator

      public static int secondaryLanguageSkillsCalculator(boolean all2)
      Calculates points for secondary language skills.
      Parameters:
      all2 - boolean indicating whether all language abilities are present.
      Returns:
      the points for secondary language skills (maximum 4 points).

    • adaptabilityCalculator

      public static int adaptabilityCalculator(boolean adaptabilitySpouseLanguage, boolean adaptabilitySpouseEducation, boolean adaptabilitySpouseWork, boolean adaptabilityYouEducation, boolean adaptabilityYouWork, boolean adaptabilityYouEmployment, boolean adaptabilityRelatives)
      Calculates adaptability points based on various factors.
      Parameters:
      adaptabilitySpouseLanguage - boolean indicating if spouse has language skills.
      adaptabilitySpouseEducation - boolean indicating if spouse has education.
      adaptabilitySpouseWork - boolean indicating if spouse has work experience.
      adaptabilityYouEducation - boolean indicating if the applicant has education.
      adaptabilityYouWork - boolean indicating if the applicant has work experience.
      adaptabilityYouEmployment - boolean indicating if the applicant has arranged employment.
      adaptabilityRelatives - boolean indicating if the applicant has relatives in the country.
      Returns:
      the adaptability points (maximum 10 points).

    • arrangedEmployment

      public static int arrangedEmployment(boolean arrangedEmployment)
      Calculates points for arranged employment.
      Parameters:
      arrangedEmployment - boolean indicating if arranged employment is present.
      Returns:
      the points for arranged employment (maximum 10 points).

    • educationCalculator

      public static int educationCalculator(String education)
      Calculates points based on the applicant's education level.
      Parameters:
      education - a string representing the applicant's education level.
      Returns:
      the points for education (maximum 25 points).

    • age

      public static int age(int age)

    • calculateWorkExperiencePoints

      public static int calculateWorkExperiencePoints(int workExperience)
      Calculates points based on the applicant's work experience.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the points for work experience (maximum 15 points).

    • languageSkills

      public static int languageSkills(int speak1, int listen1, int read1, int write1)
      Calculates points for language skills in speaking, listening, reading, and writing.
      Parameters:
      speak1 - the speaking skill level.
      listen1 - the listening skill level.
      read1 - the reading skill level.
      write1 - the writing skill level.
      Returns:
      the total points for language skills (maximum 24 points).
